name: Art Nail Salon:Happy Holidays Free-Dress Up Game
name_original: Art Nail Salon:Happy Holidays Free-Dress Up Game
description:
Dress Up Game:Be a nail artist, design and paint your nails in Nail Salon, an amazing dress up and makeup game. A variety of polish color collections and decorations are available. Just like at a real store, you can pick the shapes and colors of your nails, and choose from absolutely tons of sparkling rhinestones, crystals, diamonds, gemstones, hearts, flowers to decorate your nails. You can sign your own design and save it to share with others.
The beautiful existing nails are also good choices.
Features:
Three different nail shapes
Twenty-four nail polish color collections
Twenty-four already-made nail collections
Twenty-four luxury Crystal, Diamond, and Gemstone collections
Twenty-four rhinestone, flower collections
Manicure signature
Save to camera roll
In order to provide you the best game, we are open to and would appreciate your feedback and suggestions.
